page.title: 11MEDIA _ LILLESHALL SURVEY
page.content: 3% of parents surveyed work with a Newspaper company,but 80% of the parents have a{Shropshire Star.}97% of the parents have a video.4% brothers and 4% sisters deliver papers 38% moms have a magazine and 25% dads have a magazine 36% have 1 comic and 20% have more than 1 and 27% have another book 34% children go to{Donnington Library and 29% go to{Newport. {Class Survey}38% people have T.V.'s 12% of our class have videos 52% have something to play records or tapes on 6% have car Cass. players 41% enjoy B.B.C.1 more than anything else 9% watch Breakfast T.V. T.V. is not main relaxation. Radio 1 is the favourite radio station. Most people read fiction.
